titulo: Underground Thermal Energy Storage in dense urban areas
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes: Advanced European innovative knowledge basis and increased technology competitiveness in the area thermal storage;Improved security of the future European renewable-based energy system;Contribution to the decarbonisation of cities and densely populated urban areas with high safety solutions;Significant reduction of LCOHS (Levelised Cost of Heat Storage); Local communities are engaged and their
